glosses: litter (platform designed to carry a person or a load)

examples.text: Yok içmeye bir şişe bile ayran / Ne'ne gerek senin tahtırevan
examples.translation: Not a single bottle of airan to drink / What do you need a litter for

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish تخت روان (taht-ı revân), from Classical Persian تَخْتِ رَوَان (taxt-i rawān).
